text: "Before He Cheats" is a song by American singer Carrie Underwood from her debut studio album, Some Hearts (2005). ==Music video== The music video for "Before He Cheats" was directed by Roman White. It premiered on CMT on September 7, 2006. The video debuted at number 20 on CMT's Top 20 Countdown for the week of September 21, 2006. It made history on CMT's Top Twenty Countdown for being at number one for consecutive five weeks. ==Live performances== In 2011, Carrie Underwood guest Miranda Lambert at the Capital Hoedown in Ottawa, Canada. In 2016, Carrie Underwood quest Kellie Pickler, Kelleigh Bannen, Lauren Alaina and Jana Kramer at the 4th ACM Party for a Cause Festival in Las Vegas Festival Grounds. ==References== Category:2005 songs Category:2000s ballads Category:Country ballads Category:Country rock songs Category:Carrie Underwood songs
title: Before He Cheats
